original_text: The man Jeroboam was very able, and when Solomon saw that the young man was industrious he gave him charge over all the forced labor of the house of Joseph.
korean_text: 이 사람 여로보암은 큰 용사라 솔로몬이 이 청년의 부지런함을 보고 세워 요셉 족속의 일을 감독하게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: The man Jeroboam was very able,
and when Solomon saw that the young man was industrious,
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 그 젊은이가 부지런함을 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: over all the forced labor of the house of Joseph.
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉 가문의 모든 부역 노동을 관리하게 하였다.
